docs.title: Level XP System
docs.text: This repository is a leveling system with levels and XP (experience points).

docs.title: Level XP System in HTML with JavaScript
docs.text: This app is a leveling system with levels and XP (experience points) using HTML and JavaScript.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Open index.html from html-app folder.
  3. Press the buttons to see the level ups.
